name: Phoenix Spine Ring
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives small penalty to the spell 'cold vulnerability'.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'fire vulnerability'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'fire breathing act'.
It gives small penalty to the spell 'icebolt'.
It gives small penalty to the spell 'greater cold invulnerability'.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
It decreases the users cold resistance strongly.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'firebolt'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'fire blade'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'flamestrike'.
It gives small penalty to the spell 'ice blade'.
It gives small penalty to the spell 'cold ray'.
This is a blessed artifact of Kirvana.
This artifact will help protect you from the effects of fire.
However, due to the fickle nature of the goddess of destruction
and fire, the protection will sometimes falter, harming those
around you.
